titleStmt.title: The summe of Christian doctrine written originally in Latine by John Gerhard ... and translated by Ralph Winterton ...
Aphorismi succinct et selecti. English
titleStmt.author: Gerhard, Johann, 1582-1637.
Winterton, Ralph, 1600-1636.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Roger Daniel, And are to be sold by William Hope, near the Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Translation, by Ralph Winterton, of Gerhard's "Aphorismi succincti et selecti".
Imperfect: stained, tightly bound, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
